title: Jacket Donation Drive
description: Donate a warm jacket to help those in Dhaka face the harsh winter. A small contribution goes a long way in keeping someone warm.

title: Woolen Sweater Collection
description: Help us collect woolen sweaters for families in Dhaka. Each sweater you donate will bring warmth to those who need it most.

title: Blanket Collection
description: Donate a blanket to those in need in Rangpur. A warm blanket can bring comfort during the chilly winter nights.

title: Woolen Sweater Drive
description: Provide a woolen sweater for those struggling with the cold in Rangpur. Your support brings warmth to families in need.

title: Blanket Campaign
description: Help us provide blankets to individuals in Mymensingh. A warm blanket can bring relief and comfort during the cold winter season.

title: Jacket Collection for the Needy
description: Join our campaign to provide jackets to those struggling with the cold in Mymensingh. Every jacket makes a difference.

title: Warm Shawl Drive
description: Help us provide warm shawls to individuals in Rajshahi. Your donation can be a source of warmth and kindness.

title: Warm Shawl
description: Help us provide warm shawls to individuals in Rajshahi. Your donation can be a source of warmth and kindness.
